movies.title: False Trail
movies.plot: The sequel to Jagarna (1996), the film concerns Erik who is asked to return to his hometown in Sweden to solve a brutal murder. Although hesitant to go back due to unfavourable memories of the town, Erik accepts, but finding an answer to the murder proves a complex task.
movies.simplePlot: The sequel to Jagarna (1996), the film concerns Erik who is asked to return to his hometown in Sweden to solve a brutal murder. Although hesitant to go back due to unfavourable memories of ...

biography.bio: He started acting school in Malmö and went from there to the Skånska Teatern in Landskrona, performing in plays by Shakespeare or Brecht. He made a breakthrough as Puck in William Shakespeare's 'A Midsummer's Night Dream'. He also met his wife Birgitta there. The 1990s meant a lot of work in front of the camera, playing a string of policemen, most notably Kurt Wallander from Henning Mankell's crime novels.
biography.name: Rolf Lassgård

biography.bio: Peter Stormare was born in Arbrå, Gävleborgs län, Sweden, to Gunhild (Holm) and Karl Ingvar Storm. He began his acting career at the Royal National Theatre of Sweden, performing for eleven years. In 1990 he became the Associate Artistic Director at the Tokyo Globe Theatre and directed productions of many Shakespeare plays, including "Hamlet". In 1993 he moved to New York, where he appeared in English productions. He continues to work in both the United States and his his homeland of Sweden. He resides in Los Angeles, California, USA, with his wife.
biography.name: Peter Stormare

biography.bio: Annika Nordin was born on December 11, 1959. She is an actress, known for False Trail (2011), Wolf (2008) and Anita (2007).
biography.name: Annika Nordin

biography.bio: Kim Tjernström is an actor, known for False Trail (2011) and Starring Maja (2009).
biography.name: Kim Tjernström

biography.bio: Lo Kauppi was born on April 19, 1970 in Skärholmen, Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. She is an actress and director, known for Tjuvheder (2015), The New Man (2007) and False Trail (2011).
biography.name: Lo Kauppi

biography.bio: Jesper Barkselius is an actor, known for False Trail (2011), Den blomstertid nu kommer (2017) and Lokalreportern (2004).
biography.name: Jesper Barkselius

biography.bio: Eero Milonoff was born on May 1, 1980 in Helsinki, Finland. He is an actor, known for Ganes (2007), Olli Mäki (2016) and Beauty and the Bastard (2005).
biography.name: Eero Milonoff

biography.bio: Johan Paulsen was born on September 6, 1963 in Stockholm, Stockholms län, Sweden. He is an actor and writer, known for Real Humans (2012), False Trail (2011) and Drömkåken (1993).
biography.name: Johan Paulsen

biography.bio: Ellenor Lindgren is an actress, known for False Trail (2011) and Kunskapens pris - balladen om den vilsne vandraren (2007).
biography.name: Ellenor Lindgren

biography.bio: Olov Häggmark is an actor, known for False Trail (2011) and Jag saknar dig (2011).
biography.name: Olov Häggmark

biography.bio: Jonas Hedlund is an actor, known for Valse pour Monica (2013), False Trail (2011) and Nude (2011).
biography.name: Jonas Hedlund

biography.bio: Yngve Dahlberg was born on November 4, 1967 in Paris, France. He is an actor, known for Cops (2003), En gång i Phuket (2011) and False Trail (2011).
biography.name: Yngve Dahlberg

biography.bio: Juho Milonoff was born on February 26, 1974 in Helsinki, Finland. He is an actor and writer, known for Jefferson Anderson (2007), Pasila 2.5: the Spin-Off (2014) and The Finest and the Greatest (2008). He has been married to Vilma Melasniemi since 1999. They have two children.
biography.name: Juho Milonoff

biography.bio: Elina Knihtilä was born on June 6, 1971 in Valkeala, Finland as Mari Elina Knihtilä. She is an actress and writer, known for Distractions (2015), Divorce à la finlandaise (2009) and The Good Son (2011). She is married to Tommi Korpela. They have one child.
biography.name: Elina Knihtilä

biography.bio: Michael Odhag was born on October 25, 1959 in Östersund, Jämtlands län, Sweden. He is an actor, known for The Guy in the Grave Next Door (2002), Eiffeltornet (2004) and False Trail (2011).
biography.name: Michael Odhag
